snippet.title: The Night of the Rabbit - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Free your imagination and lose yourself in a tale of magic and wonder, where anything is possible and where nothing is quite as it seems. Join young Jerry and follow a peculiar white rabbit to the wondrous realm of Mousewood, a land where critters can speak and mystery abounds. It is here that Jerry's dream of being a magician comes true, though a hauntin, sinister force casts a long shadow over the forest. As the dark power rises, the residents of mousewood have only Jerry to turn to. On an Adventure full of laughter and tears, joy and fear, the yound boy will face the ultimate trial, leaving behind the world he once knew, and his childhood, too, will become a thing of the past.

- Enjoy a multi-layered story with many lovely characters and lots of fun
- Explore worlds full of magic and see the wonderfull hand-drawn animations
- 

For further infortmation visit us on Facebook or go to the official homepage.

www.TheNightoftheRabbit.com
www.facebook.com/daedalic
www.daedalic.de/en
